member.name: M:Bam.Net.Drawing.ColorPalette.Add(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds the specified color if one with the same name has not already been added.

member.name: M:Bam.Net.Drawing.ColorPalette.Remove(System.String)
member.summary: Remove the color with the specified name if it exists

member.name: M:Bam.Net.Drawing.ColorPalette.DeriveFrom(System.Uri)
member.summary: Derive a ColorPalette from the specified Uri by finding colors in all the linked stylesheets

member.name: M:Bam.Net.Drawing.ColorPalette.DeriveFrom(System.String)
member.summary: Derives a color pallette from the specified css url

member.name: P:Bam.Net.Drawing.HexColor.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the current color. May be anything useful for remembering this color and its purpose.
